sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import Loader from '../layouts/loader' import MetaData from '../layouts/MetaData' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getProductsDetails, clearErrors } from '../../actions/productActions' const ProductDetails = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { loading, error, product } = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProductsDetails(match.params.id)) if (error) { alert(error) dispatch(clearErrors()) } }, [dispatch, error, match.params.id]) return ( {loading ? : (
{product && product.images && ( )}
{product && (

{product.name}

)}

Product # {product._id}

({product.numOfViews})

R${product.price}

- +

Status: Em estoque

Descrição:

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

Enviar avaliação
 )} ) } export default ProductDetails
